boat.name: Pintail of Morra
boat.construction_details: GRP wood cabin trim and cockpit coamings, teak over GRP deck
boat.short_description: Sold at the Amsterdam Boat Show, 1977 and owned in Holland until 2007 when returned to Rossiter Yachts for a major refit.

owners.name: Ian Kemp
owners.note: Purchased in 2008 by Ian Kemp from previous owner in Tollesbury Marina.

for_sales.sales_text:
Pintail of Morra was built by Purbeck Rossiter Yachts Ltd in 1978 for a Dutch owner in the Netherlands. She is a standard Pintail class 27â€™ GRP Bermudan Sloop.

In 2007 Pintail had an extensive refit including the installation of a new 30hp 3YM diesel, new propellor, stern tube, stern gland and stern bearing. At this time she also had new stainless steel fuel and water tanks (approx 180lts) and all new pipework. All standing rigging and rigging screws were renewed, and a removable dog house cockpit unit replaced canvas dodgers.

Below decks there are two full length berths in the main saloon, with a further two full length berths forward. Forward on the starboard side is a sea toilet and wash basin, supplied with pressurised hot and cold water. The hot water is provided by an engine calorifier or 240V shore mains, heating over 25lt water. Cabin heating by an Eberspatcher heating system with variable control.

Calor gas oven and grill, supplied from a 2.75 Camping Gaz bottle in self draining secure locker, via copper pipe with isolation taps fitted.

Ample locker space includes two full length hanging lockers plus locker space behind the bunks in the main cabin and forward. Also normal cockpit side and under seating lockers.

Anchor chain locker accommodates approx 50 m chain to a 15kg CQR type anchor. Kedge anchor and mooring lines also included in sale.

Instrumentation as follows:-

  • Furuno GPS plotter
  • Raymarine echo sounder, log, and DSC/VHF radio
  • Magnetic compass
  • Tillermate tiller auto pilot.
  • Two 12V batteries supply engine starting and domestic usage, new 2015

Currently ashore at Sutton Wharf boatyard, Rochford.
